entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 06:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Periods of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
